info-one.title: Send Transactions
info-one.text: MEW gives you full control-send your funds to anyone, anywhere, at any time, without middlemen, minimums, or limits.

info-two.title: NFT Manager
info-two.text: View and manage all of your collectibles and domains in MEW’s NFT Manager.

info-three.title: Work with other chains
info-three.text: MEW supports additional Ethereum-compatible networks including Ethereum Classic (ETC), Binance Smart Chain (BSC) and Polygon, so that users can manage assets beyond the Ethereum mainnet.

info-one.title: Cross-Chain Swaps
info-one.text: MEW offers cross-chain swaps for a variety of popular coins. Swap between Ether and Bitcoin, Litecoin, or even DOGE!

info-two.title: Competitive Rates
info-two.text: MEW works with decentralized exchange aggregators 1inch and DEX.AG to find the best price on your token swap. This way you don’t have to deal with multiple platforms to get the best rate.

info-three.title: Cash Out to Fiat
info-three.text: Our partner Bity allows anyone to cash out their Ether for Euros or Swiss Francs.
